sections.title: System Requirements
sections.content:
Before installing QuickFit Nudge, ensure your device meets these requirements:

**Minimum Requirements:**
- iOS 16.0 or later
- iPhone XS or newer
- 50MB available storage
- Active calendar with events

**Recommended:**
- iOS 17.0+ for enhanced calendar features
- Apple Watch Series 4+ for companion app
- Apple Health app for fitness tracking
- Stable internet connection for sync

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
**Download from App Store:**
1. Open the App Store on your iPhone
2. Search for 'QuickFit Nudge'
3. Tap 'Get' to download (app is free with premium subscription)
4. Wait for installation to complete
5. Tap 'Open' or find the app icon on your home screen

**First Launch:**
The app will automatically start the setup process when you first open it.

sections.title: Account Setup & Onboarding
sections.content:
QuickFit Nudge guides you through a simple 4-step setup:

**Step 1: Welcome**
- Review app introduction and core features
- Swipe right to continue

**Step 2: Calendar Access**
- Tap 'Allow Calendar Access'
- Choose 'Full Access' in iOS settings
- This lets us find workout gaps in your schedule

**Step 3: Notifications** 
- Tap 'Enable Notifications'
- Choose 'Allow' in the permission dialog
- We'll send smart reminders when it's time to work out

**Step 4: Health Integration (Optional)**
- Tap 'Connect to Health' or 'Skip'
- If connecting, choose which data to share
- This helps track your fitness progress over time

**You're Ready!**
The app immediately scans your calendar and suggests your first workout.

sections.title: Your First Workout
sections.content:
**Getting Started in 2 Minutes:**

1. **Find Your First Gap**
   - Look for the 'Next Workout Gap' card on your home screen
   - This shows the perfect time for your next quick workout
   - The app suggests the ideal workout type based on your schedule

2. **Start a Quick Workout**
   - If no gaps are available, try a 'Quick Action' button
   - Tap '1-Min Breathing' for an instant stress-relief session
   - Follow the on-screen instructions

3. **Complete Your Workout** 
   - The app automatically detects when you finish
   - You'll see a celebration screen with your achievement
   - Your first streak day is now started!

**Quick Wins:**
- Complete 3 workouts to unlock your first achievement badge
- Try each workout type to discover your favorites
- Check the Progress tab to see your growing streak

sections.title: Smart Calendar Integration
sections.overview: QuickFit Nudge analyzes your calendar to find perfect 1-5 minute gaps between meetings and appointments, then suggests workouts that fit exactly in those windows.
how_to_use:
**Automatic Scanning:**
1. The app scans your calendar every 30 minutes
2. It looks ahead 48 hours for upcoming gaps
3. Gaps appear as cards on your home screen
4. Each card shows the time window and suggested workout

**Manual Refresh:**
1. Pull down on the home screen to refresh
2. Or tap the refresh icon in the top right
3. The app rescans your calendar immediately
4. New gaps appear within seconds

**Gap Quality:**
- **Excellent** (4-5 min): Perfect for strength or cardio
- **Good** (3 min): Great for HIIT or stretching  
- **Fair** (2 min): Ideal for stretching
- **Poor** (1 min): Best for breathing exercises
use_cases: **Busy Professional:** Calendar packed with back-to-back meetings? The app finds those precious 3-minute windows between calls for a quick energy boost.
**Work From Home:** Transition between tasks with movement breaks that help you stay focused and healthy.
**Parent Schedule:** Between dropping kids off and picking them up, squeeze in workouts that fit your family routine.
tips: **Pro Tip:** Block 5-minute 'buffer' times in your calendar for guaranteed workout windows
**Best Practice:** Keep your calendar updated for most accurate gap detection
**Power User:** Use multiple calendars (work, personal, family) for comprehensive gap finding
common_issues: **No gaps showing?** Check calendar permissions in Settings > Privacy > Calendars
**Wrong suggestions?** The app learns your preferences over time
**Gaps too short?** Adjust your calendar to include small buffers between events

sections.title: Workout Library & Types
sections.overview: Six carefully designed workout categories that require no equipment and fit into micro-windows of time.
how_to_use:
**Browse Workouts:**
1. Tap the 'Library' tab at the bottom
2. Choose a category: Breathing, Stretching, HIIT, Strength, Cardio, or Family
3. Filter by duration (1-5 minutes) or difficulty
4. Tap any workout to see details and start

**Quick Actions:**
1. From the home screen, tap any Quick Action button
2. '1-Min Breathing' - instant stress relief
3. '2-Min Stretch' - perfect desk break
4. '3-Min HIIT' - energy boost
5. 'Family Fun' - activities with kids

**During Workouts:**
1. Follow the step-by-step instructions on screen
2. Use the timer to stay on track
3. Tap pause if you need a moment
4. The app auto-detects completion via your phone's motion sensors

breathing.perfect_for: Stress relief, meditation, between stressful meetings

stretching.perfect_for: Desk breaks, morning wake-ups, post-workout cooldown

hiit.perfect_for: Energy boost, metabolism kick, midday pick-me-up

strength.perfect_for: Building muscle, functional fitness, feeling strong

family.perfect_for: Quality time with kids, teaching healthy habits

tips: **Start Small:** Begin with 1-minute breathing exercises to build the habit
**Mix It Up:** Try different workout types to keep things interesting
**Family Time:** Get kids involved with the family workout category

sections.title: Apple Watch Companion
sections.overview: Complete workout experience on your wrist with haptic feedback, independent operation, and seamless iPhone sync.
how_to_use:
**Initial Setup:**
1. Install QuickFit Nudge on your iPhone first
2. The Watch app installs automatically
3. Open the Watch app and complete pairing
4. Grant HealthKit permissions for workout tracking

**Starting Workouts:**
1. Open QuickFit Nudge on your Apple Watch
2. Browse suggested workouts or quick actions
3. Tap 'Start' and feel the gentle haptic confirmation
4. Follow instructions on the watch screen

**During Workouts:**
1. Feel haptic taps for exercise transitions
2. See your progress on the circular timer
3. Tap the Digital Crown to pause/resume
4. Completion is detected automatically with celebration haptics

**Independent Use:**
1. Your Watch works without your iPhone nearby
2. Workouts sync back when devices reconnect
3. HealthKit data is saved locally and synced later
use_cases: **Traveling:** Work out in your hotel room using just your Watch
**Phone-Free:** Exercise in the backyard while kids play, no phone needed
**Discrete Workouts:** Quick breathing exercises in meetings using only Watch vibrations
tips: **Haptic Feedback:** Keep 'Prominent Haptic' enabled in Watch settings for best experience
**Battery Optimization:** Watch app uses minimal battery (less than 2% per workout)
**Complication Access:** Add QuickFit Nudge to your watch face for instant access (coming soon)

sections.title: Streaks & Achievements
sections.overview: Gamified progress tracking that celebrates consistency and motivates long-term healthy habits.
how_to_use:
**Viewing Progress:**
1. Tap 'Progress' tab to see all streaks and achievements
2. Current streaks show with flame icons
3. Tap any achievement to see progress and requirements
4. Share achievements via social media or messages

**Streak Types:**
- **Daily Workouts:** Consecutive days with at least one completed workout
- **Weekly Goal:** Complete 5+ workouts per week consistently  
- **Early Bird:** Workouts completed before 7 AM
- **Family Champion:** Regular family workouts with kids
- **Consistency King:** Workout at similar times regularly

**Achievement Tiers:**
- **Bronze:** First steps (1-3 workouts)
- **Silver:** Building habits (7-14 workouts) 
- **Gold:** Serious commitment (30+ workouts)
- **Platinum:** Lifestyle transformation (100+ workouts)
use_cases: **Motivation:** Check progress when feeling unmotivated to see how far you've come
**Social Proof:** Share achievement screenshots to inspire friends and family
**Goal Setting:** Work toward next milestone badge for continued engagement
tips: **Grace Periods:** Daily streaks have 48-hour grace period for sick days or emergencies
**Multiple Streaks:** Focus on one streak type initially, then add others as habits form
**Celebration:** App celebrates every milestone with notifications and visual rewards

sections.title: Smart Notifications
sections.overview: Perfectly timed, actionable notifications that help you never miss a workout opportunity.
how_to_use:
**Gap Notifications:**
1. Receive alerts 5 minutes before detected calendar gaps
2. Notification shows gap duration and suggested workout
3. Tap notification to open app and start workout
4. Or use quick actions: 'Start Now', 'Remind in 30min', 'Dismiss'

**Streak Reminders:**
1. Daily gentle reminders to maintain your streak
2. Customizable timing (default 8 PM)
3. Only sent if you haven't worked out that day
4. Motivational messages that evolve with your progress

**Achievement Notifications:**
1. Instant celebration when you unlock new badges
2. Rich notifications with achievement details
3. Tap to share accomplishment or view progress

**Notification Settings:**
1. Go to Settings tab > Notifications
2. Toggle notification types on/off
3. Adjust timing preferences
4. Control notification frequency

gap_alerts.content: Perfect timing! You've got 3 minutes for a quick HIIT session

streak_reminders.content: Your streak is counting on you - just a few minutes keeps momentum going

achievements.content: Achievement unlocked! You earned Week Warrior - 7 consecutive days

tips: **Smart Timing:** Notifications only appear during appropriate hours (7 AM - 10 PM)
**Context Aware:** Gap notifications won't interrupt 'Do Not Disturb' or Focus modes
**Personalization:** Messages become more personalized as the app learns your patterns

sections.title: Setting Up Your Perfect Workout Schedule
steps:
**Step 1: Review Your Calendar**
Open your default calendar app and ensure all your meetings, appointments, and commitments are properly scheduled with accurate start and end times.

**Step 2: Add Buffer Times**
For optimal gap detection, add 5-minute buffer periods before important meetings. This gives you guaranteed workout windows.

**Step 3: Configure QuickFit Nudge**
Go to Settings ‚Üí Workout Preferences and set:
- Preferred workout duration (1-5 minutes)
- Workout types you enjoy most
- Times when you don't want to be disturbed

**Step 4: Enable Smart Notifications**
In Settings ‚Üí Notifications:
- Turn on 'Gap Alerts' for workout reminders
- Set your preferred reminder timing (5-15 minutes before gaps)
- Enable 'Streak Reminders' for daily motivation

**Step 5: Test the System**
Create a fake 10-minute gap in your calendar tomorrow and watch QuickFit Nudge detect it and suggest the perfect workout.
sections.expected_outcome: You'll start receiving perfectly timed workout suggestions that fit seamlessly into your existing schedule without disrupting your day.
tips: Start with longer buffer times (10 minutes) and gradually reduce as you get faster at workouts
Use calendar blocking for 'workout windows' during particularly busy weeks
Sync all your calendars (work, personal, family) for comprehensive gap detection

sections.title: Building Your First 7-Day Streak
steps:
**Day 1: Start Small**
Complete any 1-minute breathing exercise. This builds the habit without intimidation. Use a calendar gap or Quick Action button.

**Day 2: Add Movement** 
Try a 2-minute stretching session. Perfect for between meetings or during TV commercial breaks.

**Day 3: Increase Intensity**
Complete a 3-minute HIIT workout. Use a detected gap or schedule a specific time in your calendar.

**Day 4: Family Time**
Involve kids or partner with a 5-minute family workout. This counts toward multiple streaks simultaneously.

**Day 5: Morning Energy**
Try an early morning workout (before 7 AM) to start your Early Bird streak alongside your daily streak.

**Day 6: Workplace Wellness**
Use a work break for a quick stretching or breathing session. Show colleagues how easy workplace fitness can be.

**Day 7: Celebration**
Complete any workout to achieve your 'Week Warrior' badge! Take a screenshot and share your success.
sections.expected_outcome: You'll unlock your first achievement badge and establish a sustainable daily movement habit that fits your lifestyle.
troubleshooting: **Missed a day?** The app has 48-hour grace periods - complete two workouts the next day to maintain your streak
**Too busy?** Remember that 1-minute breathing exercises count - something is always better than nothing
**Lost motivation?** Check your Progress tab to see how far you've come and what badges await

sections.title: Maximizing Apple Watch Integration
steps:
**Step 1: Initial Setup**
Ensure your Apple Watch is paired and running watchOS 9.0+. Open QuickFit Nudge on iPhone and allow HealthKit access.

**Step 2: Install Watch App**
The watch app installs automatically. If not, open the Watch app on iPhone ‚Üí My Watch ‚Üí scroll to 'Available Apps' ‚Üí install QuickFit Nudge.

**Step 3: Configure Health Permissions**
On your watch: Settings ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Health ‚Üí QuickFit Nudge ‚Üí Allow all permissions for workout tracking.

**Step 4: Test Standalone Operation**
Leave your iPhone at home and try starting a workout from your watch. It should work independently and sync later.

**Step 5: Customize Haptic Feedback**
In Watch Settings ‚Üí Sounds & Haptics ‚Üí enable 'Prominent Haptic' for better workout cue feedback.

**Step 6: Set Up Complications (Future)**
Add QuickFit Nudge to your watch face for instant workout access without opening the app.
sections.expected_outcome: Your Apple Watch becomes a complete, independent fitness companion that works with or without your iPhone nearby.
use_cases: **Phone-Free Workouts:** Exercise in the garden while kids play, using only watch guidance
**Discrete Office Workouts:** Use haptic-only breathing exercises during meetings
**Travel Fitness:** Work out in hotel rooms using just your watch and bodyweight

sections.title: Creating Family Fitness Routines
steps:
**Step 1: Start with Fun**
Open Family tab and choose 'Dance Party' workout. Let kids pick their favorite song and follow along.

**Step 2: Involve Kids in Planning**
Show children the different family workout options and let them choose tomorrow's activity. Ownership increases participation.

**Step 3: Create Challenges**
Set up friendly competitions: 'Who can hold a plank the longest?' or 'Best animal walk impression?'

**Step 4: Schedule Regular Times**
Block 5-10 minutes in your calendar for family fitness time. Consistency helps it become a habit for everyone.

**Step 5: Celebrate Together**
When you unlock family-related achievements, celebrate as a family. Take photos and create positive associations.

**Step 6: Adapt to Age Groups**
Use the age recommendations in each family workout. Older kids can do full exercises while toddlers can 'help' or watch.

age_recommendations.2-4_years: Focus on copying movements, basic jumping, and following simple instructions like 'hop like a bunny'
age_recommendations.5-8_years: Can follow multi-step instructions, compete in friendly challenges, and understand basic fitness concepts
age_recommendations.9-12_years: Can do modified adult exercises, track their own progress, and help motivate younger siblings
age_recommendations.teenagers: Can participate in full adult workouts and may prefer competing against parents' achievements

tips: Always prioritize fun over perfect form with kids
Use imagination - 'warrior poses' and 'animal movements' are more engaging than 'squats' and 'lunges'
Short sessions (3-5 minutes) work better than longer ones for young children
Let kids demonstrate exercises to the family for confidence building

questions.question: Do I need an Apple Watch to use QuickFit Nudge?
questions.answer: No! QuickFit Nudge works perfectly on iPhone alone. The Apple Watch companion app enhances the experience with haptic feedback and wrist-based controls, but all core features work great on just your iPhone.

questions.question: How does the app find time for workouts in my busy schedule?
questions.answer: QuickFit Nudge analyzes your calendar to find gaps between meetings and appointments that are 1-5 minutes long. It then suggests workouts that fit perfectly in those windows, so you never have to skip meetings or appointments to stay active.

questions.question: What if I don't have any gaps in my calendar?
questions.answer: Even with a packed schedule, you can use the Quick Action buttons on the home screen for instant 1-3 minute workouts. These are perfect for bathroom breaks, while coffee is brewing, or any tiny moment you have available.

questions.question: Do the workouts require any equipment?
questions.answer: No equipment needed! All workouts are designed to be done anywhere using just your bodyweight. You can exercise in your office, hotel room, living room, or even a bathroom stall if needed.

questions.question: Is QuickFit Nudge free to use?
questions.answer: QuickFit Nudge offers a generous free experience with basic workouts and features. Premium subscription ($9/month) unlocks the full workout library, advanced achievement tracking, and priority support.

questions.question: What's included in the Premium subscription?
questions.answer: Premium includes: full workout library (100+ exercises), advanced streak tracking, detailed progress analytics, priority customer support, early access to new features, and family sharing for up to 6 people.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
questions.answer: Yes! You can cancel anytime through your iPhone Settings ‚Üí [Your Name] ‚Üí Subscriptions ‚Üí QuickFit Nudge ‚Üí Cancel. You'll keep premium access until your current billing period ends.

questions.question: Do you offer family subscriptions?
questions.answer: Yes! Premium subscriptions include family sharing, allowing up to 6 family members to access premium features under one subscription. Perfect for getting the whole family active together.

questions.question: What personal data does QuickFit Nudge access?
questions.answer: We only access data you explicitly grant permission for: calendar events (to find gaps), health data (to track workouts), and motion data (to detect exercise completion). We never access personal information from your calendar events - only start/end times.

questions.question: Is my health data shared with anyone?
questions.answer: Never! Your health and workout data stays on your devices and in your private iCloud account. We don't share, sell, or access your personal health information. You maintain complete control through iOS privacy settings.

questions.question: Can I use the app without connecting to Apple Health?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Apple Health integration is entirely optional. You can track workouts within QuickFit Nudge without sharing data with the Health app. All core features work without Health app connection.

questions.question: How do you protect my calendar privacy?
questions.answer: We only read event start/end times to identify gaps - never event titles, locations, or attendees. The app processes this information locally on your device and doesn't store or transmit calendar content to our servers.

questions.question: Are these workouts actually effective in just 1-5 minutes?
questions.answer: Yes! Micro-workouts have proven benefits: they boost energy, improve circulation, reduce stress, and add up to significant activity over time. Even 1 minute of movement is better than none, and consistency matters more than duration.

questions.question: What if I'm not very fit or haven't exercised in years?
questions.answer: Perfect! QuickFit Nudge is designed for real people with real lives. Start with 1-minute breathing exercises to build the habit, then gradually try gentle stretching. Every workout has beginner modifications and progresses at your pace.

questions.question: Can I modify workouts if I have injuries or limitations?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Each workout includes modification suggestions, and you can always adapt exercises to your abilities. For specific medical concerns, consult your healthcare provider. The app encourages listening to your body above all else.

questions.question: Will such short workouts actually help me lose weight or build muscle?
questions.answer: Micro-workouts primarily boost daily energy, improve mood, and create healthy habits. For significant weight loss or muscle building, you'll need longer workouts too. Think of QuickFit Nudge as the foundation that makes longer workouts more achievable.

questions.question: Which devices and iOS versions are supported?
questions.answer: QuickFit Nudge requires iOS 16.0 or later and works on iPhone XS and newer. Apple Watch companion requires watchOS 9.0+. The app is optimized for current iOS versions and regularly updated for compatibility.

questions.question: Why isn't my Apple Watch showing workouts?
questions.answer: Ensure your watch is running watchOS 9.0+, the watch app is installed, and both devices are signed into the same iCloud account. Try opening the app on both devices simultaneously to force sync.

questions.question: The app isn't finding gaps in my calendar. What's wrong?
questions.answer: Check that you've granted 'Full Access' to calendars in iOS Settings ‚Üí Privacy ‚Üí Calendars ‚Üí QuickFit Nudge. Also ensure your calendar events have specific start/end times (not all-day events) and that multiple calendars are all enabled.

questions.question: How do I contact support if I need help?
questions.answer: Go to Settings ‚Üí Help & Support in the app for instant assistance. Premium subscribers get priority email support with typical response within 24 hours. We're here to help you succeed with your fitness goals!

content.achievement: Digital badges earned by completing fitness milestones (e.g., '7-day streak', 'Early Bird'). Achievements provide motivation and track long-term progress.
content.calendar_gap: A period of 1-5 minutes between scheduled calendar events, identified by the app as perfect timing for a quick workout.
content.gap_quality: Rating system (Excellent/Good/Fair/Poor) that evaluates workout opportunities based on duration, timing, and context.
content.quick_actions: One-tap workout buttons on the home screen for instant fitness: 1-Min Breathing, 2-Min Stretch, 3-Min HIIT, Family Fun.
content.streak: Consecutive days of completed workouts. Multiple streak types track different patterns: Daily, Weekly Goal, Early Bird, Family Champion.
content.micro_workout: Ultra-short fitness sessions (1-5 minutes) designed to fit into tiny schedule gaps without changing clothes or needing showers.
content.workout_type: Six categories of exercise: Breathing (stress relief), Stretching (mobility), HIIT (energy boost), Strength (muscle building), Cardio (heart health), Family (kid activities).
content.haptic_feedback: Gentle vibrations on Apple Watch that guide workouts without sound - perfect for discrete exercise or quiet environments.
content.family_workouts: Kid-friendly activities designed for parents and children to exercise together, building healthy family habits.
content.premium_subscription: Paid tier unlocking full workout library, advanced progress tracking, detailed analytics, and priority support.

apple_watch_requirements.recommended_model: Series 6 or newer for best performance

calendar_limitations.timezone_support: Full support for all timezones and DST

workout_limitations.modification_levels: Beginner modifications available for all exercises

data_sync_limitations.backup_retention: 30 days of backup data in iCloud

known_limitations: Apple Watch app basic functionality only

update_policy.frequency: Monthly minor updates, quarterly major features
update_policy.automatic_updates: Enabled by default, can be disabled in iOS settings
update_policy.beta_testing: TestFlight program available for premium subscribers
